content.solutions: digital consulting,customer journey mapping,mobile app poc
content.title: Helping a large US quick service restaurant improve customer experience and operational efficiency
content.content: A large US based quick service wanted Quinnox to help them transform their Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) experience to improve sales and add value across their value chain. Quinnox undertook a study of the customer ecosystem and the QSR value network. As an outcome of this consulting engagement we presented the necessary customer experience interventions to help meet the goals for the customer, restaurant & franchisee and distribution centers. The outcome translated into a number of business process changes across the supply chain to improve fulfillment as well as the introduction of some new group ordering features on the brands mobile app for better ordering experience and increase in revenue.

content.solutions: design thinking workshop to advise on improving field agent experience and provide a customer 360 view to the business
content.title: Transforming the Insurance buying and claims experience for purchasers and field staff for a large Insurance company in the middle east
content.content: A large Insurance company in the middle east wanted to transform the customer experience for its insurance buyers as well as streamline processes for its agents to help them have a unified view of their customers. The Quinnox customer experience team undertook a study of the customer ecosystem and created buyer and agent personas and presented its recommendations on how to have an omni-channel experience to make it easy for new and existing customers to buy and manage their policies and claims in a quick, easy and seamless manner while trying to help improve customer intelligence for the agents to have a 360 view of their customers. The outcome translated into business process and service design changes along with strong integration and mobile solutions to help the customer improve the claims experience for their customers and improve operational efficiency for their field force.

keywords: digital transformation of power distribution and utilities
customer experience improvement during a storm and hurricane
content.title: Reducing storm restoration costs and improving customer experience for one of north america large power distribution and utilities company
content.content: Quinnox helped one of north america largest power distribution and utilities company reduce their storm restoration costs which were spiralling year on year and also helped them digitalize their manual processes to manage a huge contract restoration workforce through efficient mobile and cloud based solutions. the outcome was more real-time insights to the end users both residential and commercial customers, storm restoration crew and ability to easily assess, record and report restoration progress and help the right restoration teams with the right equipment reach the affected areas in the most optimum time. the solution also helped the customer realise revenues otherwise lost when they restored services for other ancillary service providers using their infrastructure. this led to plugging revenue leaks and improving overall storm restoration costs and customer experience

solutions: conversational interface solution over messenger and alexa
content.title: Leveraging conversational interfaces to help perfume scientists and flavourists with their formulation processes
content.content: Quinnox engaged with the world second largest fragrance and flavour company to leverage conversational interfaces as a tool to guide the formulation activities for perfume scientists and flavourists. this was to ease the dependency on multiple legacy based apps that were required to be referenced during a formulation process. quinnox demonstrated the efficacy of a conversational interface using nlp and chatbots as well as voice based interfaces like alexa and google home to drive digital transformation for their back office experts. the outcome was a clear shift in the way of working resulting in operational efficiencies and revenues for the fragrance and flavour business of the customer.

solutions: customer experience and human factors assessment
web and mobile user experience design
content.title: User experience transformation of legacy based formulation applications to improve human factors and transform back office operations
content.content: Quinnox engaged with the world second largest fragrance and flavour company to study its legacy application landscape from a user experience and human factors perspective. quinnox undertook a study of the domain, the user task flows and business processes and studied the users behaviour with existing systems. the new user experience design built on human factors and usability seeks to help business users create novel formulations by reducing chances of duplications at a very early stage using principles of machine learning and ai. the outcome resulted in reduced losses due to duplications, increase in novel formulations, higher revenues and higher compliance.

solutions: cloud based humanized conversational interface poc
keywords: digital transformation of environmental solutions company
digital transformation of the enterprise intranet
customer experience improvement for employee engagement and workforce transformation
content.title: Transforming the enterprise intranet for one of the largest integrated environmental solutions company in the united states
content.content: The customer experience team at quinnox has closely worked with the business users of one of america largest integrated environmental solutions company in leveraging conversational interfaces to replace their traditional non-engaging intranets. the team did a consulting engagement to demonstrate hyper personalisation for enterprise users to improve engagement and meet both business and employee goals. this demonstration on workforce transformation using nlp based conversational interfaces driven by machine learning have created a renewed interest across the company users and senior leadership for whom workforce engagement and transformation is a key kpi.

solutions: iot and gamified fleet on street mobile application
keywords: digital transformation for back office automation
content.title: Digitally transforming the field force experience using gamified mobile applications for india largest fmcg company
content.content: India large consumer goods company in the water purification, health and hygiene solutions for home and corporate users was struggling with automating their fleet on street processes to gain improved insights on their field force and reduce the tat for their end customers. the customer also wanted the field force to be empowered with unified view of the customers for a more personalized experience from a service and support perspective as well as to help upsell and cross sell relevant products. quinnox conducted a user research, field study and a design thinking workshop to understand the challenges, motivations and drivers for the field force and came up with a gamified mobile solution to help essentialize the app for the field force to increase adoption as well drive motivation using principles of gamification. the outcome was greater insights on field force for business with an easy way for fleet on street to engage with business as well as end customers using minimum data entry on the mobile app as well as drive compliance and improve customer satisfaction. this also helped increase revenue with more upsell and cross sell opportunities for the field staff.

solutions: web and mobile user experience design
content.title: Digitally transforming patient care experiences for one of america largest healthcare providers
content.content: Quinnox engaged with one of north carolina largest healthcare service provider to improve their operational efficiency and help them deliver affordable patient care. quinnox worked with the business leaders to understand the existing business processes and application landscape. with the aim of rationalising their applications and introducing innovative mobile and wearable solutions to transform the way patients consume health care services in a more proactive manner, quinnox worked with the customer to bring about this digital shift for their hospital operations and patient care applications. the outcome resulted in optimal scheduling of staff duties, more visibility of patients through mobile and wearable data proactively feeding the profiles of patients seeking better and affordable patient care

solutions: field study and internet of things (iot) solution framework
keywords: digital transformation for farm to fork
content.title: Transforming farmer experiences using iot and cloud solutions for food and water sustainability
content.content: Quinnox engaged with the world second largest fragrance and flavour company to address the problem of raw material sustainability for one of their key fragrance products having a geographical indicator in south india. quinnox undertook a field study to understand the farm operations and the water availability problems in the farm borewells. quinnox presented a solution framework to help the customer leverage iot and sensors to measure water availability and its utilization by the farmers from their bore wells. this data would then be made available to the customer to understand water availability and utilization patterns, rainfall and other weather indicators that contribute to ground water recharges and provide farmers with insights to undertake crop rotations as per water availability thereby maximize farmers earnings while ensuring sustainability of the produce of raw materials. the outcome resulted in digitalizing the bore wells for monitoring water availability and its usage to maximize sustainability, increase yield and improve farmer experiences.

solutions: user experience for web and mobile application for improving dealer experience with strong reporting and analytics features
content.title: Helping one of chicago most innovative companies take their battery management information system (bmis) and stationary power infra to the cloud
content.content: A case of one of the world leaders in battery management seeking to move to a cloud-based solution, with multi-geo accessibility and upgradable and scalable solution. quinnox helped create new value in predictive maintenance through actionable analytics, customer service, battery management, lot management, pre-delivery inspection and warranty maintenance, all this on a web and mobile responsive interface hosted on cloud with strong analytics and reporting features built in.

solutions: user experience on android mobile applications
content.title: Creating omni-channel shopping experiences for a large american multinational consumer electronics retailer
content.content: A case of an american multinational consumer electronics corporation seeking a solution for seamless omni-channel shopping experience. quinnox crafted a mobile solution where they can track real-time inventory across all stocking points and enhance in-store online ordering. with features like real time updated product catalogue, price comparators, barcode scanning and gps with centralized monitoring system, quinnox helped them in their digital transformation initiatives to create a new value in their overall operational process. the outcome was an enhanced in-store shopping experience coupled with increase in revenue.

content.title: Fleet and route optimisation solutions for america largest integrated environmental solutions company
content.content: A case of one of the leading provider of integrated environmental solutions where quinnox helped re-imagine their existing operations and create new value out of it by re-imagining operations like route optimisation, fleet operation optimization to maximize resource utilization, dynamic dispatching, mobile communication and real-time asset tracking for efficient supply chain operations. all this backed with solid reporting and insights. the outcome was seen in reduced number of customer support calls and queries, increased turnaround time and real-time visibility into day to day field operations thereby improving operational efficiency.

content.title: Business reporting solutions for a global leader in branded lifestyle apparel, footwear and accessories
content.content: A case of one of north carolina based global lifestyle apparel company where quinnox helped them in creating new reports for their business decisions using sql server reporting service (ssrs 2008 r2) and ibm cognos 10 report studio and also provided support and maintenance for the same. the outcome translated into improved operational efficiencies for the business.

solutions: created a cloud based digital platform for connecting healthcare providers with patients and their wearables and by leveraging big data and analytics
content.title: Developed a digital healthcare platform for a us based tech firm focused on providing cloud based user-focused health systems
content.content: A case in health care where patients and clinicians can come together to deliver on healthcare outcomes and enhance patient experience by using wearable devices that can gather real-time insights from patients and allow clinicians track health and provide proactive diagnosis. quinnox built the digital healthcare platform that leverages big data to allow for proactive and personalized healthcare outcomes for patients. the cloud based solution leverages historical patient data to lower the cost of delivering personalized health care thereby creating a compelling case for health care service providers and patients alike.

solutions: ux design for brief management poc
content.title: Digitally disrupted the ‘brief management process’ for the world second largest fragrance and flavor company
content.content: A case of one of the world second largest fragrance & flavor company which used conventional methods to gather briefs for their fragrances and flavors that took more time and was not intuitive. quinnox disrupted the brief gathering process by making it intuitive and added a touch of diy to the customers who could now easily specify their briefs for the formulations the desired for their fragrances and flavors. this solution was more visual backed by machine learning and big data that gave the business a better understanding their customer personas. it provided valuable insights by abstracting the complexities of chemical formulations with a do-it-yourself kind of intuitive interface to be able to give more accurate chemical composition. the in-depth analysis of the brief is done considering various parameters and trends according to the market to give new value to the business and the end customer. the outcome was an enhanced brief gathering experience resulting in faster brief capture times and improved operational efficiency for the formulations functions.

content.title: Helped a global market leader in the logistics industry improve its operational efficiency and regional compliance
content.content: Quinnox enabled a global market leader in the logistics industry improve time to market and helped with gst and custom regulation compliance to help the customer improve operational efficiency. quinnox developed and supported secure code standards with faster ramp-ups to fulfil ad-hoc requests to ensure faster time to market. the outcome was seen in terms of improved operational efficiency with increased compliance to gst and custom regulations.

solutions: image recognition using machine learning poc
content.title: Leveraging IoT and machine learning to predict yield for one of india largest hybrid seeds company
content.content: A case of one of india major hybrid seed producing company seeking a digital agriculture solution to enable early prediction of yield for their crops to help them right size their future warehousing and logistical requirements and business decision planning. quinnox leveraged iot and its own insights platform backed by machine learning to get approximate yield by capturing various parameters from the different kinds of sensors placed in the farms and provided recommendations based on the real-time climate conditions so that yield can be measured effectively at appropriate stages of crop growth.

content.title: Improving employee engagement using nlp based conversational interfaces for a large global producer and marketer of chemical and related products
content.content: A case of one of the largest chemical producer where quinnox helped them re-imagine their enterprise portals including their enterprise intranets by introducing nlp based smart conversational interface platform. the solution seamlessly integrates with in-house enterprise and third party systems and has opened an altogether new channel for their b2e transactions, improving employee engagement by introducing hyper personalization driven by intelligent conversational interfaces and machine learning. the outcome resulted in improved employee engagement, improved operational efficiency and addition of new b2b, b2c and b2e use cases.

content.solutions: digital consulting,mobile inventory management solution,rapid prototyping
content.title: Quinnox develops Mobile Inventory Management application for a mall-based specialty retailer of casual apparel and accessories in a short time frame of 10 weeks
content.content:
Quinnox engaged with the Mall-based specialty retailer of casual apparel and accessories that provides customers with a focused selection of high-quality, fashion and fashion basic merchandise at compelling values. The objective was to mobilize the inventory management process in stores so that sales team could do stock in and stock out on the shop floor and attend the customer at the same time.
The team assessed and analyzed the existing Inventory Management system, the gaps and issues. Quinnox set up an Offshore team for Ideation / wireframes designs, rapid prototyping and development. Customized the Quinnox Q-IMS solution architecture to develop the Mobile Inventory Management application. Extended the existing inventory system functionalities to mobile devices. Designed and integrated the application with back-end Point of Sales (POS) databases such as:
> Verifone Payware IR scanner for scanning bar codes
> AirPrint for printing shipping labels and document shipment manifests

content.solutions: in store sales app, task management app
content.title: Quinnox award winning Omni-Channel solution enhances inventory visibility and availability for a multinational consumers electronics corporation
content.content:
Quinnox engaged with a US based consumer electronics chain to digitalize the store operations. The customer was having showrooming challenges competing with online sites with regard to price. The customer created a renewed strategy which included empowering sales and innovate store experience.
Quinnox team has set up a Mobile Development Innovation Factory for Ideation / wireframes designs, prototyping and development. Integrated the mobile solution with the existing ERP system to ensure that the sales associate is empowered to help the customer.
The following features were made available in the application
> Real-time inventory visibility across all stocking points
> In-store online ordering (store representative-assisted) with direct-to-consumer shipping or pick up from another store >
Real time updated product catalog
> Price Comparisons
> Online task manager and to-do list tool
> Integrated the solution with the latest mobile technology features like barcode scanning, GPS (for store locations with inventory) and Camera feeds (for task scheduling)
> Implemented a centralized monitoring system

content.solutions: in store sales app, task management app
content.title: Quinnox created a solution for logistics industry that worked as an electronic proof of delivery
content.content:
Quinnox engaged with one for large Food logistics company in North America. The challenge was that the deliveries were managed manually. The driver spent lot of time in Pre and post-delivery for documentation and during the delivery.
The ePod application used by the driver enables him/her to get the entire delivery end to end process on a mobile handheld device.
This is a business critical application covering the end to end Delivery Management System and integrated with the client internal systems.
Major business functions covered by the app:
> View real time delivery, status, time, information etc.
> Assists driver with routes, traffic and parking information
> Allow scanning of pallets/cases to update the records and also display Case and Pallet level information.
> Generate, update and print invoices and other delivery documents digitally on the handheld device.
> Improve driver experience Improve operational efficiencies.
> Benefits of the app
> Eliminate delivery paperwork and the associated costs
> Digital invoice generation and Proof of Delivery (signature & captured document images)
> Assists driver with routes, traffic and parking information
